00045 volatile sig_atomic_t sigterminate = 0;
00046 
00047 void catchterminate(int sig)
00048 {
00049   sigterminate = 1;
00050   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00051   signal(sig, catchterminate);
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 void cleanup(int ret)
00056 {
00057   // stop all mpi clients
00058 
00059 #ifdef MPI
00060   int task=TASKFIN;
00061   BroadcastTask(&task);
00062 
00063   MPI_Finalize();
00064 #endif
00065  
00066   // terminate program with return code
00067   exit(ret);
00068 }

00071 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00072 {
00073   createinfo(argc, argv);
00074 
00075 #ifdef MPI
00076   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00077   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00078   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00079 
00080   // fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00081 
00082   if (mpirank != 0) {
00083     MinimizerSlave();
00084 
00085     MPI_Finalize();
00086   } else {
00087 #endif
00088 
00089   int c;
00090   int cm=1;
00091   double omega=0.0;
00092   int overwrite=0;
00093   int maxsteps=100;
00094   double precision=0.0000001;
00095   double shakemag=0.0;
00096 
00097   // handler for INT and TERM signals
00098   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
00099   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
00100 
00101 
00102   if (argc < 3) {
00103     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s interaction slaterdetfile\n"
00104             "\n   -h OM           minimize in external oscillator"
00105             "\n   -o              use new parameters even if energy has gone up"
00106             "\n   -m MAXSTEPS     maximum number of steps (default %d)"
00107             "\n   -p PRECISION    desired precision (default %f)"
00108             "\n   -s MAGNITUDE    shake parameters before minimization\n",
00109             argv[0], maxsteps, precision);
00110     cleanup(-1);
00111   }
00112   
00113   while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "h:om:p:s:")) != -1)
00114     switch (c) {
00115     case 'h':
00116       omega = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00117       break;
00118     case 'o':
00119       overwrite = 1;
00120       break;
00121     case 'm':
00122       maxsteps = atoi(optarg);
00123       break;
00124     case 'p':
00125       precision = atof(optarg);
00126       break;
00127     case 's':
00128       shakemag = atof(optarg);
00129       break;
00130     }
00131   
00132   char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
00133   char* parafile = argv[optind+1];
00134 
00135   Interaction Int;
00136   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00137     cleanup(-1);
00138   Int.cm = cm;
00139 
00140   Parameterization P;
00141   Para qinitial;
00142   if (readParafromFile(&P, &qinitial, parafile))
00143     cleanup(-1);
00144 
00145   SlaterDet Q;
00146   SlaterDetAux X;
00147 
00148   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00149   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00150   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00151 
00152   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00153   double einitial;
00154   calcHamiltonian(&Int, &Q, &X, &einitial); 
00155   fprintf(stderr, "\ninitial:\tE = %8.3f MeV\n\n", hbc*einitial);
00156 
00157 #ifdef MPI
00158   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00159   BroadcastA(&Q.A);
00160 #endif
00161 
00162   Para q;
00163   P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00164 
00165   // shaking the parameters ?
00166   if (shakemag)
00167     shakePara(&q, shakemag);
00168   
00169   gradSlaterDetAux dX;
00170   gradSlaterDet dH;
00171 
00172   initgradSlaterDetAux(&Q, &dX);
00173   initgradSlaterDet(&Q, &dH);
00174   
00175   int steps = -1;
00176   double e, h;
00177   double dh[q.n];
00178 
00179   Minimizer mini;
00180   initMinimizer(&mini, q.n, precision);
00181 
00182   do {
00183 
00184     steps++;
00185 
00186     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00187     
00188     calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00189     calcgradSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X, &dX);
00190 
00191 #ifdef MPI
00192     calcgradHamiltonianmpi(&Int, &Q, &X, &dX, &dH);
00193 #else
00194     calcgradHamiltonian(&Int, &Q, &X, &dX, &dH);
00195 #endif
00196     e = dH.val;
00197 
00198     // in oscillator potential ?
00199     if (omega)
00200       calcgradOsci2(&Q, &X, &dX, omega, &dH);
00201 
00202     h = dH.val;
00203     P.ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(&q, &dH, dh);
00204 
00205     if (omega)
00206       fprintf(stderr, "step: %3d\tE = %8.3f MeV,\t Vosci = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00207               steps, e*hbc, (h-e)*hbc);
00208     else
00209       fprintf(stderr, "step: %3d\tE = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00210               steps, e*hbc);
00211 
00212   } while (!sigterminate && 
00213            MinimizerStep(&mini, q.x, h, dh) && steps < maxsteps);
00214 
00215   // no improvement ? then exit
00216   if (!overwrite && einitial < e) 
00217     cleanup(0);
00218 
00219   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00220 
00221   // move SlaterDet to origin in phase space
00222   // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00223 
00224   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00225 
00226   // normalize SlaterDet
00227   normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00228 
00229   if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00230     SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00231 
00232   // calculate the observables
00233   Observables Obs;
00234   
00235   calcObservables(&Int, &Q, &Obs);
00236 
00237   double vosci;
00238   if (omega) {
00239     calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00240     calcOsci2(&Q, &X, omega, &vosci);
00241   }
00242 
00243   backup(parafile);
00244 
00245   fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", parafile);
00246 
00247   FILE* outfp;
00248   if (!(outfp = fopen(parafile, "w"))) {
00249     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", parafile);
00250     cleanup(-1);
00251   }
00252 
00253   fprintinfo(outfp);
00254 
00255   fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00256           "# using %s interaction\n", 
00257           cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, Int.name);
00258 
00259   if (sigterminate)
00260     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimization was terminated prematurely\n");
00261 
00262   if (omega)
00263     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized in external oscillator,\tVosci = %8.3f MeV\n",
00264             hbc*vosci);
00265 
00266   fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00267 
00268   fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00269   fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00270   P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00271  
00272   fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00273   writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00274 
00275   fclose(outfp);
00276 
00277   fprintf(stderr, "... %4.2f minutes computing time used\n", usertime()/60.0);
00278 
00279   cleanup(0);
00280 
00281 #ifdef MPI
00282   }
00283 #endif
00284 }
